author: markt
msg: Avoid unexpected closure of the socket if the socket is first registered for one event and then later registered for another.

author: markt
msg: If the socket is being destroyed, need to remove it from the addList (and closeList) as well.

author: markt
msg: With the introduction of upgrade and non-blocking, I/O can occur on non-container threads. This makes it near impossible to track whether a SocketWrapper (== connection) is still referenced or not, making re-use a risky proposition.
